thread.title: Jennifer Lawrence gives piggyback ride to Aziz Ansari
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lawrence gives piggyback ride to Aziz Ansari - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Jennifer Lawrence gives piggyback ride to Aziz Ansari
text:
Oscar-winning actress Jennifer Lawrence showed off her strong bond with Aziz Ansari as she gave the funnyman a piggyback ride to his car.
Read: Brie Larson in talks to replace Jennifer Lawrence in 'Glass Castle'
The 25-year-old Oscar-winning actress gave Aziz a piggyback ride to his car as they left the Saturday Night Live after-party venue at the Wayfarer Restaurant in New York on Saturday, October 10, reported Ace Showbiz.
The blonde beauty was photographed wearing a gray turtleneck crop top featuring long sleeves. Jennifer flaunted her toned tummy as she wore low-waisted trousers.
She completed her look with black heel sandals. Aziz, meanwhile, wore a white shirt topped with leather jacket. He donned black jeans and brown blucher shoes.
Earlier this month, the two had fun together alongside pal Amy Schumer. In a video posted on the "Trainwreck" actress' Instagram page, Aziz gave a very loud wakeup call for Amy's sister Kim Caramele. "This morning @azizansari and Jen woke up an angel #sleepmanager," Amy captioned the video.
